hero.title: CertiFerox (CFXR)
hero.subTitle: CertiFerox is a pioneering innovation company that merges deep, AI-driven insights with multidisciplinary expert knowledge, focusing on creating next-generation EdTech products and developer platforms for the talent of tomorrow.

problems.title: The Problems We Address
problems.content: Many industries and fields are facing growth bottlenecks rooted in cognitive inertia, information friction, and a lack of deep, truly interdisciplinary integration. Existing innovation models often fail to address the core of the problem.

advantage.title: Competitive Advantage & Moat
advantage.advantageContent: Strategic consulting, AI data modeling, product prototyping, multidisciplinary team collaboration, and high-end brand building.
advantage.moatContent: Our team brings together analysts, AI scientists, designers, and artists, enabling us to systematically solve complex problems from multiple dimensions. Through the high-quality content and brand appeal generated by Project SUNSET, we attract the most promising core user groups at an extremely low cost.

verisona.title: Verisona AI x SUNFIND
verisona.description: Disrupting the traditional study abroad agency model by providing applicants with a highly personalized, full-process, intelligent application assistance platform powered by AI. We partner with 'Project SUNFIND' to offer half-price memberships to students from financially disadvantaged families, aiming to break down educational barriers through technology.

meowoj.title: MeowOJ
meowoj.description: An online judge and learning community for programming enthusiasts worldwide. We not only provide a high-quality competitive programming problem set but also incorporate AI-assisted learning and unique community incentive mechanisms.

sunset_lab.title: SUNSET Lab
sunset_lab.description: A core ideological laboratory that explores the nature of innovation by creating thought-provoking digital art and websites, sparking industry dialogue and attracting top talent who share our values.

sunfind.title: Project SUNFIND - Our Commitment to Financial Aid
sunfind.content: CertiFerox firmly believes that talent should not be limited by background. Therefore, we initiated Project SUNFIND, a financial aid program for students from middle-class and low-income families. In conjunction with our flagship product, Verisona AI, we offer eligible students memberships from half-price up to fully-free, hoping to use the power of technology to help every ambitious youth chase their dreams to the edge of the sun.

process.title: The CFXR Innovation Process
process.content: Insight → Design → Application. A trinity of innovation.

culture.title: Team Culture
culture.content: Boldly hypothesize, carefully verify. Unity of knowledge and action, deconstructive critique.
